overview: The story of Ghaly Sultan Wardat al-Qusour, who is looking for a bride, does not find it, which makes his mother the sultan forcing him to choose through a test put to the girls of the city, at the same time combine the bad conditions Moulay Ghali star star of the bathroom owner's muezzin, nicknamed "Khenefa ash", to start between them series Conflicts through which the star proves that Kid women and their ploy stronger than the oppression of men.
title: خنيفيسة الرماد
